Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to permitting a qualified inmate eligible for early release to receive a conditional release
Summary: Relates to permitting an inmate who has had a final order of deportation issued against him or her, has not been convicted of an A-1 felony and who is eligible for early release to receive a conditional release.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to permitting a qualified inmate eligible for early release to receive a conditional release
